meta-description: Here some projects I worked on.
notlelo-description: At scout camps we are asked to record the batch numbers of all the food we eat. This is a very repetitive and time-consuming task, which is what led me to develop the Notlelo application on Android. Originally developed with React Native, I then developed it with Android Compose.
notlelo-screenshot-alt-1: Home page of the Notlelo application
notlelo-screenshot-alt-2: Library screen to view all registered products
